abstract: British banks may need another state bailout next year and their borrowing requirements could hit £25 billion ($39.5 billion) a month, a research organization said, although the British finance minister dismissed any such scenario.
snippet: British banks may need another state bailout next year and their borrowing requirements could hit £25 billion ($39.5 billion) a month, a research organization said, although the British finance minister dismissed any such scenario.
lead_paragraph: British banks may need another state bailout next year and their borrowing requirements could hit £25 billion ($39.5 billion) a month, an independent research organization said, although the British finance minister dismissed any such scenario, Reuters said.

headline.main: British Banks May Need New Bailout, Researchers Says
